item.description:
Hi everyone!

June is a busy month for family events: school graduations, weddings, sports & dance recitals! This month our meet up falls on Father's day. We will be holding our regular monthly meet up from 1:00pm-3:00pm. If you have free time Bring your favorite pooch to exercise & socialize. We'll have both the indoor & outdoor areas available so you can relax & unwind from your hectic commitments and enjoy watching man's Best Friend romp and play!

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Happy Father's Day
